title: Boundary Bethe ansatz in massless AdS3
authors:
Daniele Bielli (Chulalongkorn University), Vasileios Moustakis
  (University of Surrey), Alessandro Torrielli (University of Surrey)
abstract:
We construct the boundary algebraic Bethe ansatz for the $AdS_3 \times S^3
\times T^4$ integrable reflection problem restricted to the massless sector. We
derive the double-row monodromy and find the appropriate formulation of the
so-called {\it dual} equation of Sklyanin's. We perform the algebraic Bethe
ansatz based on Sklyanin's recipe, and obtain the RTT (more properly RTRT)
relations, from which the spectrum is obtained by repeated action of the $B$
operator on the pseudovacuum. We obtain the Bethe equations by cancelling the
unwanted terms, and provide conjectures for the exact formulas for any number
of quantum particles and magnonic excitations.
